title: Snowdown Chests + Crafting

replies.body: Gemstones have only provided normal chests when fused, and not currently intended to provide themed chests.  Per the[ snowdown crafting ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016)guide, the poro king fragments should drop from purchased chests so you won't find them in gemstone fused or champion mastery chests.  I hope that helps clear some things up!

I hope that helps clear some things up!

Sure does!
Just so I'm 100% though - do the poro pieces drop from the regular Winter chest you can purchase? Or only the higher priced ones(Legacy and Snowdown)?
The poro king chest fragments should have a chance to drop in any snowdown chest.

Well I got the Poro King chest..
And I'm disappointed to find out that it is ANY skin permanent.. not a snowdown skin :(

Sigh. Atleast I have a skin for Blitzcrank now.
May I ask if its intended that we can't gift the themed chests?  It's really sad if that's the case.

Happy Snowdown, friend!   Currently, hextech crafting isn't giftable content in general which themed chests fall under.  I do think it would be a neat feature, though!  As a workaround, you could gift your friend RP and they can get it.
